column1: Little Goat Diner////I came here for dinner last week and shared the strawberry short shake
column5: and pecan pie. The Korean burger was quite tasty but extremely hard to eat because the bun was soggy. The cheesy garlic bread was good
column6: but the marinara was bland. The shake
column8: and pecan pie were tasty. The service was so-so. We told our waitress we'd like to share the shake
column9: and she came back with two straws and seemed irritated with us when we asked for a second glass.
